mapper.select: select id, talent_id, enterprise_id, add_remark, logistics_project_type, detail_item, address, telephone_number, recipient, logistics_type, is_confirm, status, confirm_remark, confirm_cost, creator_id, gmt_create, regenerator_id, gmt_modified from construction_industry_api.t_logistics where talent_id = #{talentId} order by gmt_create desc

select id, talent_id, enterprise_id, add_remark, logistics_project_type, detail_item, address, telephone_number, recipient, logistics_type, is_confirm, status, confirm_remark, confirm_cost, creator_id, gmt_create, regenerator_id, gmt_modified from construction_industry_api.t_logistics where enterprise_id = #{enterpriseId} order by gmt_create desc

select id, talent_id, enterprise_id, add_remark, logistics_project_type, detail_item, address, telephone_number, recipient, logistics_type, is_confirm, status, confirm_remark, confirm_cost, creator_id, gmt_create, regenerator_id, gmt_modified from construction_industry_api.t_logistics order by gmt_create desc
